A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: look not horrible\, but not great. I still think the force awakens was a benchmark of new starwars gen movies and was brilliantly done with just the right amount of everything. I don't get it though with movies that they always try to go bigger and better than the last\, which just makes them worse and then drags down the sequels. and with a lot of films like starwars it dosent need that\, it will do it on its own. pick up the pieces and do it justice in the finale.
